name: AMSTRED
description:
Description

AMSTRED is a simple arcade game, where you have to survive through rooms full of danger until you find the final exit.

How to play

To start the game: run "template

Enter the room. Look around.Start moving.Pick the key. Open the rainbow door.Run through. Repeat.

You control RED using the arrow keys and you can run faster by maintaining the space bar. I will add joystick support in the next version.

Authors and licenses

AMSTRED was programmed in C & ASM using our own AMOK engine. No libraries were used. Maybe we should have though?

  • Alex Hiza: programmer, art & game design
  • John Random: level design
  • Tove Bee: music 
Gesture

When you pick up a key, it opens the rainbow door that bring you into a similar room but even more dangerous. Some rainbows are nicer than others I guess.
